name: Unending
description:
Unending is a roguelite-puzzle anthology.

It explores a specific type of turn-based combat familiar to players of traditional roguelikes, broughlikes, and grid-based combat games.

In Unending you get to play:
  • Puzzles: Over 100 short challenges.
  • Dungeons: A selection of roguelite gauntlets featuring bespoke mechanics.

This game is a sequel to Ending, a flash / mobile game. An approximate recreation of that game's dungeon and levels can be played in this game.

Unending is an open-ended project. Designed to receive new mechanics, puzzles, dungeons, and accessibility features - as and when the developer finds time or inspiration.
